summary: Feature request to add support for default/dynamic update handlers in the TypeScript SDK, similar to the existing setDefaultSignalHandler functionality.
userImpact: Users cannot set default update handlers for workflows, limiting flexibility in handling dynamic updates similar to signal handlers.
proposedFix: Implement setDefaultUpdateHandler functionality following the pattern established by setDefaultSignalHandler and consistent with other SDK implementations.
resolutionDetails: Marked as duplicate of #1015, which is part of the broader feature request in temporalio/features#201 for dynamic update handler support across all SDKs.
keyQuote: workflow.setDefaultSignalHandler exists. The equivalent functionality for update should exist also.
